SELECT
RAM.DEVICE_RAM_CAPACITY
CAP.CAPACITY_TYPE
DISP.DEVICE_DISPLAY_SIZE
FROM DEVICE D JOIN RAM ON D.DEVICE_RAM_CODE = RAM.DEVICE_RAM_CODE JOIN DISPLAY DISP ON D.DEVICE_DISPLAY_CODE = DISP.DEVICE_DISPLAY_CODE JOIN CAPACITY_PRICE CP ON D.DEVICE_NO = CP.DEVICE_NO JOIN CAPACITY CAP ON CP.CAPACITY_NUMBER = CAP.CAPACITY_NUMBER
SELECT DEVICE_NO, DEVICE_IMG, DEVICE_NAME FROM DEVICE
